Important information
Safety Information:
Periodically check the entire product/cords/accessories for damage. A damaged or non-functioning unit should no longer be used. If the product/ cords/accessories are damaged, take it to an Oral-B Service Centre. Do not modify or repair the product. This may cause fire, electric shock or injury. Usage by children under age 3 is not recommended. Toothbrushes can be used by children and persons with reduced physical, sensory or mental capabilities or lack of experience and knowledge, if they have been given supervision or instruction concerning use of the appliance in a safe way and understand the hazards involved. Cleaning and maintenance shall not be performed by children. Children shall not play with the appliance. Use this product only for its intended use as described in then instruction manual. Do not use attachments which are not recommended by the manufacturer.
Directions:
Wet the toothbrush head, apply toothpaste, guide the brush along all tooth surfaces in a circular motion for two minutes, twice a day, paying attention to pressure applied while brushing. Replace the brush head every three months.
Product description
Product Description
The iO 3 electric toothbrush features Oral-B’s best technology, combining a dentist-inspired round brush head with micro-vibrating bristles for a professional purifying clean feel at home. The Smart Pressure Sensor helps prevent you from brushing either too hard or too softly to better protect your gums. Gum Guard alerts you to time spent brushing with too much pressure. Replace your Oral-B iO toothbrush head every 3 months for good results.
Directions
Wet the toothbrush head, apply toothpaste, guide the brush along all tooth surfaces in a circular motion for two minutes, twice a day, paying attention to pressure applied while brushing. Replace the brush head every three months.

Top reviews from United Kingdom
M
Good
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 September 2024
Style Name: Smart 6 BlackVerified Purchase
The Oral-B Smart 6 Electric Toothbrush is an excellent choice for those seeking a thorough clean and smart features. With five brushing modes, including a whitening option, it caters to various dental needs. The app connectivity is a game-changer, offering real-time feedback and helping improve brushing habits. The brush feels premium, and the battery life is impressive, easily lasting over two weeks on a single charge. The included travel case is a nice bonus for those on the go. Overall, it’s a great investment for enhanced oral care.

mad mike
Good dental cleaning
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 September 2024
Style Name: Smart 6 BlackVerified Purchase
Purchased this as an upgrade from my previous. First use was a little amazing in like I should have done this sooner. A quality clean achieved then downloaded the app to which your signposted to. The query is still out on that one. Yet brush is great well constructed and better Led lit guides on battery life. The charging stand I give a thumbs up for, as it's more stable being wide than my last. Liking the travel case with this and the additional heads included. Overall a better grip in the hand, balanced and lightweight. Gone are the days of the manual brushing.
4 people found this helpful
Helpful
Report
RHK
Great Clean, useless app and how it could have been better
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 October 2023
Style Name: Smart 6 BlackVerified Purchase
I recently took the plunge and spent a whopping £70 on this toothbrush, which, honestly, felt like a pretty steep investment for what it offers. But my dentist practically ordered me to, and I tend to listen when she speaks, so here we are.

First off, it's undeniably a sleek-looking toothbrush, exuding a sense of quality craftsmanship. And the most crucial aspect – my teeth feel incredibly clean and look sparkly after using it. It seems to go the extra mile compared to regular brushing, leaving me with a fresh, just-left-the-dentist's-chair sensation. The battery life is impressive, lasting for days without needing a recharge, which is a plus.

Now, let's talk about the 5 brushing mode icons, or rather the lack thereof. You'll need to consult the manual to decipher their order, and the only way to distinguish between them is by the different sounds they make when you switch between modes. Not the most user-friendly approach, to say the least. Additionally, the app that comes with this toothbrush left much to be desired. The one feature I was truly interested in, the ability to monitor the coverage for each individual tooth, isn't included with this model. You'd have to fork out over £100 for that privilege. Essentially, the app boils down to nothing more than a fancy 120-second timer.

In summary, this toothbrush does its job exceptionally well, as it should for its £70 price tag. However, given the hefty cost, it's hard not to feel a tad miffed, especially when you consider that the app's standout feature comes with a much higher price point. While it leaves your teeth brilliantly clean, you might want to think twice before investing unless you're willing to splurge for the full package.
Read more
72 people found this helpful
Helpful
Report
Amazon Customer
Wow
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 June 2024
Style Name: Black Handle and HeadVerified Purchase
I am one of the pickiest people going on most things (annoyingly so) and can honestly say this is the best toothbrush I have ever used in my life. I never would have spent crazy money on an electric brush but I got a deal on this for just under £70 with a voucher and my dentist says I'm in the early stages of gum issues so I needed to do something. I'm a late 20s woman. WOW. My teeth felt SO CLEAN after the first brush, literally as clean as a hygenist appointment but minus the inconvenience. It is gentle, easy, lets you know if you brush too hard, and the clean feeling lasted hours and hours. Usually I brush with an ancient oral b electric then a manual and a tiny tepe and those three things together did not get my teeth as clean as this one toothbrush did. Mum says teeth haven't "ever looked this clean/white". I got stuck camping overnight recently with zero toothbrush and when I came home it had been 24 hr since I last brushed my teeth - so you know how much you need to floss/brush by then. I brushed using this, and after flossed to see how much plaque had been left - there was almost zero plaque removed by the floss because the brush completely removed it all. Honestly an amazing buy and I have no doubt my dentist will be over the moon - my gums are also less red and no longer bleeding at all.

EDIT: few months later battery is dead, I still love my toothbrush and it's being repaired as I type this (fingers crossed) but longevity wise come on guys??

Compact, efficient and long lasting
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 August 2024
Style Name: Smart 6 BlackVerified Purchase
This toothbrush was a boojue buy for myself. But, it has been worth every penny. The toothbrush comes with a really well thought out carry case. Which holds the brush and 2 brush heads. It's really easy to clean as well, taking up seconds of your day to do so.

The brush itself has 3 speeds, I personally use the slowest one for longevity but all of them are impactful. A nice feature is the ring light which will go red if you're applying to much pressure to your mouth.

It's a really well designed toothbrush with exceptional features.
